name: Super pingu world
description:
Super pingu world
A fun and easy game to play for all ages.
Play through 3 different worlds and over 20 action packed levels filled with traps, monsters and obstacles that might just take you down if you're not alert.

NO ADS and NO IN APP PURCHASES
Just 100% full game with no disturbance what so ever.

Collect stars and gather different powerups along the way and finish the levels with full points.
Really easy to navigate and fun for all ages to play

Super classy arcade game type with easy controllers.

Do not miss out on Super pingu world!

Don't forget to rate the game
